landing.summary: As a great enthusiast of computer science since high school, I knew from the start that I wanted to make it my profession. Daily challenges in this field inspire me to continuously improve my skills.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.biography: I am a JavaScript developer based in Antananarivo, with 5 years of experience in the tech industry. I started my journey as an intern Android developer at etech Consulting, where I discovered my passion for JavaScript development.
aboutMe.otherStacks: I can also work with these frameworks and tools

project.title: Projects
project.bsa-description: A search engine for health providers on BSA's network. It allows users to search for health providers by name, specialty, location, and more.
project.chat-description: Ask questions and chat GPT API will give you answers. It's a clone of the famous ChatGPT
